content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString, text_width = 10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    result = ""
    for word in words
        if length(result)+length(word)+1 > text_width
            result *= "\n"
        elseif !isempty(result)
            result *= " "
        end
        result *= word
    end
    return result
end
```
Example:
```julia
println(wrap_string("This is a long string with lots of words and it needs to be wrapped.", 15))
```
